structured.description: A Spring Boot application that uses the BCrypt password encryption algorithm to securely store and hash passwords. The `BCryptPasswordEncoder` class is used to handle strong password validation, and it provides several methods for encrypting, hashing, and verifying passwords.

    edge [color="#26de81"]
}

items.description: is a Spring Boot application that provides a `BCryptPasswordEncoder` instance for encrypting passwords using the BCrypt algorithm. The encoder is designed to handle strong password validation and is suitable for use in web applications.
items.name: MyHomeServiceApplication

items.description: starts the MyHomeServiceApplication and runs it using SpringApplication.

params.name: args
params.description:
0 or more command-line arguments passed to the `SpringApplication.run()` method when executing the Java application.

* The `SpringApplication.run()` method is used to launch the application.
* The `MyHomeServiceApplication.class` is the class that defines the application.

items.name: main
